ComicInfo.Title: Dresspool; "Make Way For Deadpool!"; The Etiquette Lesson; Friends Share Because Friends Care!; The Alphadead; Pool-by-numbers
ComicInfo.Summary: Three stories starring Deadpool! The Merc with a Mouth goes to the aquarium with Blind Al, learns to be a Good Samaritan with Captain America, and crashes a birthday party (literally) with Blarney the dinosaur!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 21:45:31. [CVDB109764]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Chris Sotomayor, Comicraft, Joe Cooper, Scott Koblish
ComicInfo.Editor: Bob Harras, Matt Idelson, Paul Tutrone
ComicInfo.Characters: Batroc, Blind Al, Captain America, CF, Colossus, Cyclops, Deadpool, Flatman, Joseph Merrick, Montgomery, Mr. Fantastic, Nightcrawler, Norman Osborn, Patch, Professor X, Slayback, Storm, T-Ray, Typhoid Mary, Widdle Wade, Wolverine, Zzzax
